goal: Analyze seasonal trends and forecast future values in the time series dataset.
persona: A seasoned data analyst with over 7 years of experience in time series analysis and forecasting, specializing in identifying seasonal patterns and trends. They are adept at using statistical techniques and models such as ARIMA to generate accurate forecasts and provide actionable insights. Their primary interest lies in leveraging data to uncover time-dependent behaviors and patterns to aid strategic planning and decision-making.
